official-title.#text: To amend the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013, to modify the amounts appropriated for the Federal Aviation Administration, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Air Traffic Control Tower Funding Restoration Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Modification of Federal Aviation Administration funding

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended by adding at the end the following:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Title VIII of Division F of the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013/d:F/t:VIII
Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013/s:1101

quote.#text: Department of Transportation, Federal Aviation Administration, Operations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be applied to funds appropriated by this division—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: title I of the Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012/t:I

italic.#tail: , That the amounts specified in the matter under the heading

quote.#text: $10,350,000 shall be for the contract tower cost-sharing program and not less than $130,500,000 shall be for the contract tower program for contract towers in operation as of February 1, 2013
$10,350,000 shall be for the contract tower cost-sharing program

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the following amounts are rescinded from the following accounts:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985

text.#text: Of amounts appropriated for fiscal years before fiscal year 2013 that remain available for obligation as of the date of the enactment of this Act and that are not designated an emergency requirement pursuant to a concurrent resolution on the budget or the
